item.title: Hello World
item.description: Not sure what I’ll dump in here – kind of like a customized LinkedIn page? Generated this little website with Hugo so I don’t overscope and ditch things halfway. We’ll see how the content keeps up though lol.
item.content:
Not sure what I’ll dump in here – kind of like a customized LinkedIn page?

Generated this little website with Hugo so I don’t overscope and ditch things halfway. We’ll see how the content keeps up though lol.
